title: Dragon buffs
body:
Am i the only one that feels like only 1 team should have the buff?

eg- if you get 3 dragons in a row, you have the 3 buffs.  But then if the other team gets dragon they have 1 buff and you have 0 again.

That would make more sense to me.

replies.body:
That would ruin the whole point of it, the fact that if you miss an early dragon you might be put in a position where the enemy have enormous power.
If dragon were to operate that way, a team could invest heavily into taking the first four dragons, and then the other team on a slight random play might pick up the fifth, negating literally all the power the team had gained.

While this is partially true, it does create more counter play, and reduce the insane snowballing that the multi-stack dragon buff provides.

Currently victory can be very much {{champion:86}}teed for the team that secures dragon first. Especially if you have a jungler that thrives in the new jungle better than the enemy jungler.
